items.sentence: Have you ever thought about studying French?
Have you ever visited the Statue of Liberty?
Did you really forget your passport at home?
Did you sleep on the couch again last night?
I haven\'t been invited to Tom\'s party yet.
I was absent from school because I was sick.
I was at the hospital with Tom when he died.
If I knew Tom\'s address, I\'d write to him.
Tom applied for a job as an English teacher.
Tom is helping Mary get ready for the party.
Tom is in charge of the hostage negotiation.
Tom is in his office listening to the radio.
Tom is in the living room watching the news.
I didn\'t realize you were interested in it.
I didn\'t say anything to hurt his feelings.
I didn\'t see the explosion. I just felt it.
I didn\'t think Tom would give up like that.
Tom doesn\'t speak either French or English.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary has passed away yet.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary is going to do that.
